content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

Ah, yes, please do add that to your table! It's great that you're keeping track of your sales accurately. Remember to update your table with the additional sale of 8 candles on March 18th. You can simply add a new row to the table with the correct information:

| **Date** | **Product** | **Quantity Sold** | **Unit Price** | **Total Sales** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 2023-03-18 | Strawberry Jam | 12 | $8.00 | $96.00 |
| 2023-03-18 | Candle | 8 | $12.00 | $96.00 |
| ... | ... | ... | ... | ... |

Don't forget to update your totals and summaries accordingly. If you need any help with formulas or calculations, feel free to ask!

Remember, accurate record-keeping is essential for any business, and you're taking a great step by tracking your sales regularly. Keep up the good work, and I hope your business continues to thrive!
